messages.content: Nicholas Rodriguez works with Grace Alvarez.
Grace Alvarez is a colleague of Rachel Allen.
Rachel Allen works with Barbara Simmons.
Barbara Simmons is a colleague of Steven Howard.
Steven Howard works with Samuel Scott.
Samuel Scott is a colleague of Melissa Ramos.
Melissa Ramos works with Alan Young.
Alan Young is a colleague of Raymond Johnson.
Raymond Johnson works with Brittany Harris.
Brittany Harris is a colleague of Teresa Young.

queries.question: Are Nicholas Rodriguez and Teresa Young related to each other at work through colleagues relations?

reference_answer.text: Yes, they are indirect colleagues according to their graph relations.
